DOC.brief_summary: The objective study ass whether structured exercise program compare routine recommendation exercise positive impact disease outcome patient type 2 diabetes . This study aim ass whether structured exercise program impact follow determinant disease type 2 diabetes : HbA1C , blood pressure , lipid , body mass index waist circumference . It also aim assess compliance retention patient type 2 diabetes structured exercise program .
DOC.brief_title: Impact Structured Physical Activity Education Delivery Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus
DOC.criteria: Man woman type 2 diabetes Ready begin regular physical activity Age equal great 18 Age equal less 64 . Any vascular disease Exhibits symptom coronary artery disease ( CAD ) History lose balance dizziness History losing consciousness Has bone joint problem could make bad change physical activity Pregnant Has exclude Patient 's Physician healthrelated reason state exclusion criterion .
